short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Inject charts in your private leaderboard page for Advent of Code - see https://github.com/jeroenheijmans/advent-of-code-charts

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Inject charts in your private leaderboard page for Advent of Code.

This is a very adhoc extension, coded in true AoC fashion. No warranty, but lots of fun though!
